summary: An Italian Countess is allied with Nationalists during the Italian-Austrian war of unification. However, she risks betraying their cause when she falls in love with an Austrian Lieutenant.
cast: Farley Granger|Alida Valli|Massimo Girotti|Heinz Moog|Rina Morelli|Christian Marquand|Sergio Fantoni|Tino Bianchi|Ernst Nadherny|Tonio Selwart|Marcella Mariani|Franco Arcalli|Aldo Bajocchi|Ottone Candiani|Nando Cicero|Claudio Coppetti|Cristoforo De Hartungen|Tony Di Mitri|Eugenio Incisivo|Marianne Leibl|Jean-Pierre Mocky|Spartaco Nale|Ivy Nicholson|Mimmo Palmara|Winni Riva|Carlo Sabatini|Goliarda Sapienza|Renato Terra|Gustl Untersulzner|Mario Valente
title: Senso
